name: dahora-roots-backend
description: Backend API para o e-commerce Dahora Roots

scripts.init-db: node -e "const sqlite3 = require('sqlite3').verbose(); const fs = require('fs'); const db = new sqlite3.Database('./database.db'); const sql = fs.readFileSync('./database.sql', 'utf8'); db.exec(sql, (err) => { if (err) console.error(err); else console.log('Database initialized'); db.close(); });"

author: Dahora Roots
